changeSet.author: niro_bb
changeSet.sql: create table user_role ( user_login text references service_user(login) not null, role_id text references role (id) not null, primary key (user_login, role_id), foreign key (user_login) references service_user(login) on delete cascade on update cascade, foreign key (role_id) references role (id) on delete cascade on update cascade );
